DataElement.preferredName: Wide Range Achievement Test 3 Domain Name
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text terms by which test sections of the Wide Range Achievement Test Revision 3 (WRAT3) are known; WRAT3 is a standardized, individually-administered test of word recognition, spelling, and mathematics.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Wide Range Achievement Test, 3rd Edition Domain
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Reference to the domains included in the Wide Range Achievement Test Revision 3 (WRAT3), measuring basic skills in reading, arithmetic, and spelling.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition:
Measures basic skills in reading, arithmetic, and spelling. It is a screening test that can be administered
to determine if a more comprehensive achievement test is needed.

Concepts.definition: Measures basic skills in reading, arithmetic, and spelling. It is a screening test that can be administered to determine if a more comprehensive achievement test is needed.

Property.preferredDefinition: A collection of logically-related observations with a topic-specific commonality about the subjects in a trial, used in the regulatory submission process.  The logic of the relationship may relate to the scientific subject matter of the data, or to its role in the trial.  Typically, each domain is represented by a dataset, but it is possible to have information relevant to the same topicality spread among multiple datasets. (CDISC Glossary)

Concepts.definition: A collection of logically-related observations with a topic-specific commonality about the subjects in a trial, used in the regulatory submission process.  The logic of the relationship may relate to the scientific subject matter of the data, or to its role in the trial.  Typically, each domain is represented by a dataset, but it is possible to have information relevant to the same topicality spread among multiple datasets. (CDISC Glossary)

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

DataElement.changeDescription: Curated to support creation of neuropsychometric tool scoring formats within C3D for the CCR Neuropsychology Division.
